properties.description: Shorthand way to set an item's flex grow, shrink, and flex-basis.
Set an item's flex grow property.
Set an item's flex shrink property.

order.description: Sets the flex item's position to first.
Sets the flex item's position to last.

alignment.description: Items are centered horizontally and vertically.
Items are centered horizontally.
Items are horizontally packed toward the start of the flex-direction.
Items are horizontally packed toward the end of the flex-direction.
Items are evenly distributed in the line with equal space around them; the first and last items are off the end lines.
Items are evenly distributed in the line; first item and last items are on the end lines.
Items are distributed so that the spacing between any two items (and the space to the edges) is equal.
Items are centered in the container.
Items packed to the start of the container.
Items packed to the end of the container.
Items are evenly distributed in the line with equal space around them; the first and last items are off the end lines.
Items are evenly distributed in the line; first item and last items are on the end lines.
Items are distributed so that the spacing between any two items (and the space to the edges) is equal.
Items stretch to take up the remaining space.
Items are centered in the cross axis.
Items are placed at the start of the cross axis.
Items are placed at the end of the cross axis.
Items are stretched to fill the container.
Items are placed so their baselines align.
A single item is centered in the cross axis.
A single item is placed at the start of the cross axis.
A single item is placed at the end of the cross axis.
A single item is stretched to fill the container.
Auto re-aligns a single item along the parentâ€™s main axis.

flow.description: Establishes the layout as horizontal rows that display left to right in `ltr` and wrap onto multiple lines top to bottom.
Same as `.d-row-wrap`, but all flex items will be on one line.
Same as `.d-row-wrap`, but all flex items will display right to left in `ltr`.
Establishes the layout as horizontal rows that display right to left in `ltr` and with all flex items on one line.
Establishes the layout as vertical columns that display top to bottom in `ltr` and wrap into multiple columns left to right.
Same as `.d-column-wrap`, but all flex items will be in one column.
Same as `.d-column-wrap`, but all flex items will display bottom to top in `ltr`.
Establishes the layout as vertical columns that display bottom to top in `ltr` and with all flex items in one column.
